name: Between the Worlds
description:
We made 95% of the assets during the jam, but some assets were impossible to do during the jam. But we tried as much as we could! (SFX-Guy here: My keyboard is now full of sand. Tip: Never record steps in sand on your desk...)

We used these premade assets:

  • Unreal Engine StarterContent
  • Water from Epic Games "Water Planes"-ExampleMap
  • Model of Black Pearl (only the model): www.sharecg.com/v/68846/browse/5/3D-Model/Black-Pearl-.obj 
  • Ambient Sounds: 

    http://www.freesfx.co.uk/soundeffects/ocean/, 

  • youtube.com/watch?v=-3rb_rGlM9Y

  • https://pixabay.com/en/vintage-texture-vintage-paper-retro-2714966/#

Thanks you for Playing!
